posts.title: Perfect Posture Strap
posts.content: Easily improve your posture no matter where you sit by putting on this perfect posture strap. It wraps around your knees and lower back to stabilize your pelvis so your spine’s natural curvature is restored, helping to reduce lower back pain.

posts.title: X9R Marauder 25,000 Lumen Flashlight
posts.content: The insanely powerful X9R Marauder 25,000 lumen flashlight will turn the dead of night into high noon. Capable of lighting up to 689 yards, it comes with 8 brightness settings and a rechargeable battery that can power the flashlight for up to 27 hours.

posts.title: 70 MPH NERF Gun
posts.content: Guarantee your team comes out victorious by arming yourself with this 70 MPH NERF gun. Viewed as the crown jewel of the NERF arsenal, it holds 12 NERFS balls per magazine, has flip up sights for added accuracy, and has a trigger lock for additional safety.

posts.title: Two Person Indoor Sauna
posts.content: Pamper yourself from the comfort of home by stepping into your very own two person indoor sauna. This relaxing oasis features a solid Canadian hemlock construction along with 6 infrared carbon heaters able to provide up to 141 degrees of warmth.

posts.title: Sexy Wolf Crotch Underwear
posts.content: For the wild and untamable man it doesn’t get much better than the sexy wolf crotch underwear. Considered by many as the male version of lingerie, these sexy pair of undies are ideal for long nights of primal love-making with your mate.

posts.title: Hidden Storage Compartment Bed
posts.content: Use your bedroom’s space more efficiently than ever by storing all your stuff inside this hidden storage compartment bed. The mattress lifts up to reveal a discreet yet ample space that you can use for storing anything from clothes to books, or spare linens.

posts.title: How Not To Be A Dick
posts.content: Keep your hormonal mess of teen from turning into a total jackass by having him or her read “How Not To Be A Dick”. Author Meghan Doherty provides straightforward advice paired with comical “Dick and Jane” styled cartoons to teach everyday etiquette.

posts.title: G-Shock Rangeman Rugged Watch
posts.content: The G-Shock Rangeman rugged watch was made with outdoorsmen and adventurers in mind. Shock resistant and waterproof up to 200 meters, it is capable of tracking barometric pressure, temperature, and altitude – in addition to GPS navigation.

posts.title: Evapolar Personal Air Conditioner
posts.content: Improve your comfort and air quality simultaneously using the Evapolar personal air conditioner. Apart from spreading air evenly throughout your personal area, this compact unit humidifies and purifies the air around you while cooling it up to 15 degrees.

posts.title: Squishy Cat iPhone Cases
posts.content: Show the world how much you love your feline friends by protecting your smartphone with one of these adorable squishy cat iPhone cases. Each case features a cute cat themed design and is complemented by a little 3D silicone kitty cat that you can pet all day long.

posts.title: Casio G-Shock Skeleton Gold Watch
posts.content: To commemorate their 35th anniversary, Casio has released these eye-catching G-Shock skeleton gold watches. Featuring the same quality and durability you’ve come to expect from the brand, they boast a stunning gold design just as beautiful as it is rugged.

posts.title: Cigar Holding Glass
posts.content: Avoid having to put down your stogie every time you want to wet your whistle by drinking out of this cigar holding glass. This home bar must-have is ergonomically designed to securely hold your favorite cigar in place.
